story_arceus_06_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
HAHAHAHA! Talk to it all you like!
It’ll make no difference!
story_arceus_06_09000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Can’t you feel it? The chill creeping
through your veins—the hatred icing
your heart?
story_arceus_06_09000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Nobody can stop Giratina now! Not until
its need to take down Arceus is fulfilled!
story_arceus_06_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: I won’t let you run away from me again!
story_arceus_06_09000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I wasn’t expecting them to be this
powerful!
